main.name: Ujjwal Sharma
main.description: Student by Day, Developer by Night.
main.bio: My name is Ujjwal sharma, I'm an undergraduate in Computer Science Engineering. I am into Gaming, Bike Riding, Coding and i really like to lay my hands on new gadgets whenever i can. i have experience of about 5 months in Front-End development using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and my Favourite React during which i worked on more than 10 projects. I can make WebApps and Cross Platform Applications Using React Native.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.
